message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $900,000. It's a rare opportunity to own a unique item that's worth $800,000 to you. I'm confident you'll find it a great value.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $900,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with. Given the value to me, I'm willing to pay $750,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand that $750,000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering you the product for $850,000. I believe this price still represents a great value for you, and I'm confident we can finalize the deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $850,000 is still a bit higher than I can go at this time.  How about we split the difference and settle on $825,000? This would be a good compromise for both of us, and we can move forward with the deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $825,000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering you the product for $875,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a great value for you.

Alice, I understand you need to be closer to your target, but $875,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $810,000. This is a fair price considering the value to me and represents a good compromise for both of us.  Let's close this deal!

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $810,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm offering you the product for $855,000. This is the last concession I can make, and I believe it's still a great value for you.
